Some assets are not available through th: Some assets are not available through this interface because they may not work well with our smart contract or we are unable to allow trading for legal reasons.
Limit price is %percentage%% above the c: Limit price is %percentage%% above the current market rate. The order will be executed when the market price reaches high enough above your limit price (to also pay for limit order execution gas fees).
The transaction could not be sent becaus: The transaction could not be sent because the deadline has passed. Please check that your transaction deadline is not too low.
This transaction will not succeed either: This transaction will not succeed either due to price movement or fee on transfer. Try increasing your slippage tolerance.
The input token cannot be transferred. T: The input token cannot be transferred. There may be an issue with the input token.
The output token cannot be transferred. There may be an issue with the output token.
An error occurred when trying to execute: An error occurred when trying to execute this operation. You may need to increase your slippage tolerance. If that does not work, there may be an incompatibility with the token you are trading.
Unknown error%reason%. Try increasing yo: Unknown error%reason%. Try increasing your slippage tolerance.
Unexpected issue with estimating the gas: Unexpected issue with estimating the gas. Please try again.
Unexpected error. Could not estimate gas: Unexpected error. Could not estimate gas for the swap.
Cannot find contract of the token %token: Cannot find contract of the token %tokenAddress%
Attempting to confirm without approval o: Attempting to confirm without approval or a signature

Assuming current gas price it should exe: Assuming current gas price it should execute when 1 %assetOneSymbol% = %price% %assetTwoSymbol%
Your execution gas fees are paid for by: Your execution gas fees are paid for by the spread between your specified price and the real execution price.
Gas fees are volatile and thus the exact: Gas fees are volatile and thus the exact market price at which your order will execute is unpredictable.
It might take much longer than you expec: It might take much longer than you expected to reach the price that fills your order + fees.
\"Fee on transfer\" tokens should not be: "Fee on transfer" tokens should not be used with Limit Orders (use at your own risk)
Error occurred, please try again later: Error occurred, please try again later
I understand that small orders are execu: I understand that small orders are executed at higher execution price due to gas fees.
I understand that using taxed tokens on: I understand that using taxed tokens on limit orders is highly discouraged and not recommended - Taxed tokens can be stuck in limit orders and lost forever because of impossibility to execute an order for such tokens
Performance fee only applies to the flex: Performance fee only applies to the flexible staking rewards.
Lock staking users are earning an averag: Lock staking users are earning an average of %amount%% APY. More benefits are coming soon.
Your yield will be boosted based on the: Your yield will be boosted based on the total lock duration of your current fixed term staking position.
Renew and extend your lock to keep simil: Renew and extend your lock to keep similar benefits.
Adding more WAYA will renew your lock, s: Adding more WAYA will renew your lock, setting it to remaining duration. Due to shorter lock period, benefits decrease. To keep similar benefits, extend your lock.
Flexible staking offers flexibility for: Flexible staking offers flexibility for staking/unstaking whenever you want. Locked staking offers higher APY as well as other benefits.
The lock period has ended. Convert to fl: The lock period has ended. Convert to flexible staking or renew your position to start a new lock staking.
The lock period has ended. To avoid more: The lock period has ended. To avoid more rewards being burned, convert to flexible staking or renew your position to start a new lock staking.
Calculated based on current rates and su: Calculated based on current rates and subject to change based on pool conditions. It is an estimate provided for your convenience only, and by no means represents guaranteed returns.
You will be able to withdraw the staked: You will be able to withdraw the staked WAYA and profit only when the staking position is unlocked, i.e. when the staking period ends.
The average lock duration of all the loc: The average lock duration of all the locked staking positions of other users
You will be able to withdraw the staked: You will be able to withdraw the staked WAYA and profit only when the staking position is unlocked
Prizes will be announced and available f: Prizes will be announced and available for claiming at ~

~%num% available to claim at sales end: ~%num% available to claim at sales end

To enable farm yield boosters, you must: To enable farm yield boosters, you must follow the guide and migrate your current farming positions. However, for each farm, you will only need to migrate once.

Your voting power is determined by the a: Your voting power is determined by the amount of WAYA you held at the block detailed below. WAYA held in other places does not contribute to your voting power.
